name: GoAway
description: GoAway is a lightweight DNS sinkhole that blocks ads, trackers, and malicious domains at the network level. It provides a web-based admin dashboard for management and supports customizable blocking rules with real-time statistics tracking.
longDescription: GoAway is a lightweight DNS sinkhole that blocks ads, trackers, and malicious domains at the network level. It provides a web-based admin dashboard for management and supports customizable blocking rules with real-time statistics tracking.
